uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.apps

Class CommandLineLoggerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.apps.CommandLineLoggerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<LoggerService>, Logger, LoggerService

    public class CommandLineLoggerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggerService, Logger
    Logger service for command line tools. It is assumed that command line applications will use standard output to output their result. To avoid polluting their output, this logger writes all logging messages to standard error (even info and debug messages). This has the advantage that applications can have their output piped into another application or file but logging information to the user will still be printed on the command line (unless, of course standard error is redirected)
